kpi.name: M1000C145

kpi_info.title: RB DOWNGRADE BY PBS DUE TO AAL2 CONGESTION
kpi_info.use: The number of radio bearer downgrades by priority-based scheduling (PBS) due to Iub transport congestion. Both ATM and IP-based transport are covered. UPDATED:When the radio bearer is successfully downgraded.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB DOWNGRADE BY PBS DUE TO AAL2 CONGESTION
